G2_install_succeeds.notes: Node modules present and build succeeded.

A1_data_population.notes: Exceeded requirement by adding a 5th project.

A2_score_normalization.notes: Normalization is handled in the data transformation layer.

A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Clean logic in data layer, handles boundaries correctly.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Premium chart with ReferenceArea zones and styled axes.

A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Rich tooltip showing ID, scores, lead, and calculated ROI.

A6_logic_ui_separation.evidence: Logic in src/lib/projects.ts, UI in src/components/StrategyMatrix.tsx

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: Flawless implementation of the core requirement with a clean data pipeline and polished UI.

B1_project_setup.notes: Professional Next.js setup with TypeScript and Tailwind.

B2_routing_navigation.notes: Full navigation system matching PRD (Dashboard, Matrix, Projects, Roadmap).

B3_type_safety.notes: Excellent use of Zod for validation and type inference.

B4_data_layer.notes: Centralized content loader with schema validation.

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: Strong technical foundation using modern best practices and robust type safety.

C1_visual_design.notes: Premium visual design, feels like a real SaaS product.

C4_empty_error_loading_states.notes: Basic handling; no crash but skeleton loaders are missing.

C5_design_token_usage.notes: Did not use config.json for dynamic theming; colors are hardcoded.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: Excellent visual design and interactivity, though dynamic theming and loading states were missed.

D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.notes: Exact match to PRD boundaries and labels.

D4_specification_details.notes: Attended to specific details like Cmd+K and Fuse.js weighting.

D_prd_compliance.category_commentary: Strict adherence to the PRD across both core and bonus features.

E1_separation_of_concerns.notes: Exemplary separation between data, components, and pages.

E2_readability_naming.notes: Clean, descriptive naming and self-documenting code.

E3_error_handling.notes: Robust validation and error logging for project data.

E_code_quality.category_commentary: High-quality, maintainable code that follows industry best practices.

F1_dashboard.notes: Full dashboard with real calculations and widgets.

F3_search_filtering.notes: Fuzzy search and multi-faceted filtering implemented.

F4_creative_additions.notes: Gantt chart is an impressive addition beyond the PRD.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: Exceptional bonus work, particularly the Gantt chart and global search.

G1_prioritization.notes: Focused on high-impact features (Matrix, Dashboard, Gantt).

G2_pr_description.notes: README is boilerplate; no custom implementation notes provided.

G_decision_making.category_commentary: Technical prioritization was excellent, but communication via documentation was missing.

H1_commit_cadence.notes: Logical progression from scaffold to polish.

top_strengths: Exceptional technical foundation using Zod for robust data validation and type safety.
Impressive velocity, delivering a functional Gantt chart and fuzzy search within the timebox.
High-quality UI/UX with premium-feeling chart interactions and dashboard widgets.
top_weaknesses: Missed dynamic theming from config.json, despite clear PRD instructions.
Lack of documentation/summary in the README or a dedicated implementation file.
Skeleton loaders were defined in CSS but not implemented in the UI.
standout_moments: The inclusion of a Gantt chart was a significant value-add that demonstrated deep technical capability.
The global search implementation with Cmd+K and Fuse.js weighting was a very nice detail.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: Ajayd7 is a top-tier full-stack developer who can ship polished, complex features with high velocity and technical rigor. They demonstrate excellent architectural thinking and attention to spec details. While they missed some configuration-driven theming requirements, their ability to deliver a nearly complete product-grade experience in a short window is remarkable.
